statements: DELETE FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = 100 AND games_played > 50;
DELETE FROM player_statistics WHERE goals_scored = 0 AND assists < 5;
DELETE FROM player_stats WHERE age > 30 AND height < 6.0;
DELETE FROM performance_data WHERE performance_score < 80 AND session_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_statistics WHERE player_age > 30 AND player_height < 180.0;
DELETE FROM game_performance WHERE player_id = (SELECT player_id FROM player_stats WHERE player_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM player_stats WHERE position = 'Forward' AND height > 6.0;
